Hi Karthik,

Thank you for confirming.  The configuration settings for a Google email account are as shown below in the screenshot.  Please note that you will need to create an App password for the Google email account being used.  You can create one here by following this link: https://myaccount.google.com/apppasswords





Unfortunately I don't have available slots today for a remote session, could you let us know your availability for tomorrow or during the week if you are unsuccessful with setting up the SMTP service with the above configurations?


Kind regards
__________________
André Le Roux | Technical Support Engineer

TextBody:
Hi Vamshi,

Thank you for your time on our call today.  As we discovered on our call earlier that EPP are reporting file transfers via webmail but even through the file shadows feature is enabled for Content Aware Protection there were no file shadows present under the Content Aware Report > event logs.  For this we captured the epp client log files (debug logging), please do send to us the artifact uploaded to the EPP Server today.  Our Dev team will need these logs in order to investigate the root cause.

We also discovered that you were not able to enable "Report v2" under "System Configuration" > "System Settings" as it is greyed out.  I am consulting with the team internally today and will get back to you with feedback soon.



Kind regards
__________________
André Le Roux | Technical Support Engineer
Endpoint Protector by CoSoSys, now part of Netwrix
DLP | Device Control | Content Aware Protection | eDiscovery | Enforced Encryption
www.endpointprotector.com

Hi Vamshi,

Thank you for your time on our call today.  As we discovered on our call earlier that EPP are reporting file transfers via webmail but even through the file shadows feature is enabled for Content Aware Protection there were no file shadows present under the Content Aware Report > event logs.  For this we captured the epp client log files (debug logging), please do send to us the artifact uploaded to the EPP Server today.  Our Dev team will need these logs in order to investigate the root cause.

We also discovered that you were not able to enable "Report v2" under "System Configuration" > "System Settings" as it is greyed out.  I am consulting with the team internally today and will get back to you with feedback soon.



Kind regards

Hi Vamshi,

Thank you for your time on our call today.  As we discovered on our call earlier that EPP are reporting file transfers via webmail but even through the file shadows feature is enabled for Content Aware Protection there were no file shadows present under the Content Aware Report > event logs.  For this we captured the epp client log files (debug logging), please do send to us the artifact uploaded to the EPP Server today.  Our Dev team will need these logs in order to investigate the root cause.

We also discovered that you were not able to enable "Report v2" under "System Configuration" > "System Settings" as it is greyed out.  I am consulting with the team internally today and will get back to you with feedback soon.



Kind regards

On Tue, Jun 25, 2024 at 2:09?PM Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com> wrote:


Hi Vamshi,

Thank you for your time on our call today.  As we discovered on our call earlier that EPP are reporting file transfers via webmail but even through the file shadows feature is enabled for Content Aware Protection there were no file shadows present under the Content Aware Report > event logs.  For this we captured the epp client log files (debug logging), please do send to us the artifact uploaded to the EPP Server today.  Our Dev team will need these logs in order to investigate the root cause.

We also discovered that you were not able to enable "Report v2" under "System Configuration" > "System Settings" as it is greyed out.  I am consulting with the team internally today and will get back to you with feedback soon.



Kind regards
__________________

On Tue, Jun 25, 2024 at 2:09?PM Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com> wrote:


Hi Vamshi,

Thank you for your time on our call today.  As we discovered on our call earlier that EPP are reporting file transfers via webmail but even through the file shadows feature is enabled for Content Aware Protection there were no file shadows present under the Content Aware Report > event logs.  For this we captured the epp client log files (debug logging), please do send to us the artifact uploaded to the EPP Server today.  Our Dev team will need these logs in order to investigate the root cause.

We also discovered that you were not able to enable "Report v2" under "System Configuration" > "System Settings" as it is greyed out.  I am consulting with the team internally today and will get back to you with feedback soon.



Kind regards
__________________

Hi Vamshi,

Thank you for your time on our call today.  As we discovered on our call earlier that EPP are reporting file transfers via webmail but even through the file shadows feature is enabled for Content Aware Protection there were no file shadows present under the Content Aware Report > event logs.  For this we captured the epp client log files (debug logging), please do send to us the artifact uploaded to the EPP Server today.  Our Dev team will need these logs in order to investigate the root cause.

We also discovered that you were not able to enable "Report v2" under "System Configuration" > "System Settings" as it is greyed out.  I am consulting with the team internally today and will get back to you with feedback soon.



Kind regards

On Tue, Jun 25, 2024 at 2:09?PM Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com> wrote:


Hi Vamshi,

Thank you for your time on our call today.  As we discovered on our call earlier that EPP are reporting file transfers via webmail but even through the file shadows feature is enabled for Content Aware Protection there were no file shadows present under the Content Aware Report > event logs.  For this we captured the epp client log files (debug logging), please do send to us the artifact uploaded to the EPP Server today.  Our Dev team will need these logs in order to investigate the root cause.

We also discovered that you were not able to enable "Report v2" under "System Configuration" > "System Settings" as it is greyed out.  I am consulting with the team internally today and will get back to you with feedback soon.



Kind regards

On Tue, Jun 25, 2024 at 2:09?PM Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com> wrote:


Hi Vamshi,

Thank you for your time on our call today.  As we discovered on our call earlier that EPP are reporting file transfers via webmail but even through the file shadows feature is enabled for Content Aware Protection there were no file shadows present under the Content Aware Report > event logs.  For this we captured the epp client log files (debug logging), please do send to us the artifact uploaded to the EPP Server today.  Our Dev team will need these logs in order to investigate the root cause.

We also discovered that you were not able to enable "Report v2" under "System Configuration" > "System Settings" as it is greyed out.  I am consulting with the team internally today and will get back to you with feedback soon.



Kind regards

Subject: Re: Netwrix Support Ticket #412572 - - Customer is requesting update    [ ref:!00D70091pB.!500Qk0C7TzF:ref ]

TextBody:
Hi Vamshi,

Our server team provided a remedy for the issue with Report V2 being greyed out and the file shadows not being available.  Can we have a remote session on Monday at 2:30 PM IST so that I can  apply the procedure via the back-end of your EPP server please?



Kind regards
__________________
André Le Roux | Technical Support Engineer

On Tue, Jun 25, 2024 at 2:09?PM Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com> wrote:


Hi Vamshi,

Thank you for your time on our call today.  As we discovered on our call earlier that EPP are reporting file transfers via webmail but even through the file shadows feature is enabled for Content Aware Protection there were no file shadows present under the Content Aware Report > event logs.  For this we captured the epp client log files (debug logging), please do send to us the artifact uploaded to the EPP Server today.  Our Dev team will need these logs in order to investigate the root cause.

We also discovered that you were not able to enable "Report v2" under "System Configuration" > "System Settings" as it is greyed out.  I am consulting with the team internally today and will get back to you with feedback soon.



Kind regards
__________________

On Tue, Jun 25, 2024 at 2:09?PM Netwrix Support <techsupport@netwrix.com> wrote:


Hi Vamshi,

Thank you for your time on our call today.  As we discovered on our call earlier that EPP are reporting file transfers via webmail but even through the file shadows feature is enabled for Content Aware Protection there were no file shadows present under the Content Aware Report > event logs.  For this we captured the epp client log files (debug logging), please do send to us the artifact uploaded to the EPP Server today.  Our Dev team will need these logs in order to investigate the root cause.

We also discovered that you were not able to enable "Report v2" under "System Configuration" > "System Settings" as it is greyed out.  I am consulting with the team internally today and will get back to you with feedback soon.



Kind regards
